[[Baki]] covers his hands with the [[Blade of Wind]], delivers a barrage of punches to the opponent, and then finishes them off with an uppercut which creates a large gust of wind throwing the opponent into the air.

[[es:Bombardeo Espada de Viento]]
[[pl:Ostrze Wietrznej Zapory]]
